radiographic_examinations.findings: Identified an additional hypo-echogenic nodulation (9.9 mm maximum diameter) adjacent to the major lesion.
A 22-mm nodular lesion with unclear significance for insulinoma or splenule.
Confirmed an 8.0-mm benign insulinoma relapse (Ki-67 = 1%; 2010 WHO grading = G1) on background nesidioblastosis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: No further hypoglycemic episode occurred after subtotal pancreatectomy.
